translated: If one does not engage the object as it is established, that is not a fault of the means of valid knowledge.üîΩFor, a means of valid knowledge is that by which one obtains.

original: tshad ma ni thob par rung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma ni thob par rung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because it is possible to obtain by means of a means of valid knowledge.

original: de nyid thob pa med na ji ltar shes //
analyzed: de nyid thob pa med na ji ltar shes //
translated: If there is no obtaining of that, how is it known?

original: rang bzhin gyi khyad par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi khyad par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one sees a distinctive nature.

original: mi 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ci ltar yongs su bcad /
analyzed: mi 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ci ltar yongs su bcad /
translated: How is the nature of non-error ascertained?

original: 'o na phyi rol gyi tha snyad zad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na phyi rol gyi tha snyad zad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Well then, external conventions would be exhausted.

original: mi 'khrul pa nyid ma shes na rang gi ngo bor rig pa tsam nyid gsal bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: mi 'khrul pa nyid ma shes na rang gi ngo bor rig pa tsam nyid gsal bar 'gyur la /
translated: If non-error itself is not known, mere awareness of one's own nature would be illuminated.

original: de lta na yang phyi'i don dang rgyu gzhan la sogs pa rtogs pa ga la yod ce na /
analyzed: de lta na yang phyi'i don dang rgyu gzhan la sogs pa rtogs pa ga la yod ce na /
translated: But how can there be knowledge of external objects, causes, etc.?

original: 'di ni 'og tu bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'og tu bshad par bya'o //
translated: This will be explained later.

original: 'di'i yul gyi rnam pa lta bu'i rnam pa ni yul gyi rnam pa ste shes pa'o //üîΩde tha dad pa ni yul gyi rnam pa tha dad pa'am /
analyzed: 'di'i yul gyi rnam pa lta bu'i rnam pa ni yul gyi rnam pa ste shes pa'o // de tha dad pa ni yul gyi rnam pa tha dad pa'am /
translated: The aspect that is like the aspect of the object is the aspect of consciousness.

original: yul lta bu'i rnam pa tha dad pa ni yul gyi rnam pa tha dad pa'o //üîΩmtshungs pa ni rnam pa ste /
analyzed: yul lta bu'i rnam pa tha dad pa ni yul gyi rnam pa tha dad pa'o // mtshungs pa ni rnam pa ste /
translated: The difference in the aspect of the object is the difference in the aspect of consciousness.üîΩThe similarity in the aspect is the similarity in the aspect of consciousness.

original: snang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúappearance‚Äù is the same as the meaning of ‚Äúaspect.‚Äù

original: yul dang 'dra ba'am yul ma mngon du phyogs pa'o //
analyzed: yul dang 'dra ba'am yul ma mngon du phyogs pa'o //
translated: It is like the object or the object that is not manifest.

original: sngon po'am de'i rnam par rig pa zhes de tha dad pas blo'i rtogs pa tha dad pa yin no //üîΩtshad ma'i @20a * //üîΩ'bras bu ni don rtogs pa'am /
analyzed: sngon po'am de'i rnam par rig pa zhes de tha dad pas blo'i rtogs pa tha dad pa yin no // tshad ma'i @20a * // 'bras bu ni don rtogs pa'am /
translated: The cognition is different because of the difference in the blue or its aspect.

original: rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The result of valid cognition is the understanding of the object or the understanding of its own nature.

original: de skad du yang gzhal bya rtogs pa ni tshad ma la rag las pa yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de skad du yang gzhal bya rtogs pa ni tshad ma la rag las pa yin no zhes bshad do //
translated: Thus it is said, ‚ÄúThe understanding of the object is dependent on valid cognition.‚Äù

original: yul gyi rnam pa de yang shes pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa de yang shes pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Also, the aspect of the object becomes the nature of consciousness.

original: des na shes pa nyid tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: des na shes pa nyid tshad ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, consciousness itself is the valid knowledge.

original: gal te ci ltar de rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin pa de bzhin du rtogs pa yang yin pa des na shes pa nyid 'bras bu'i yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ci ltar de rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin pa de bzhin du rtogs pa yang yin pa des na shes pa nyid 'bras bu'i yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If one says: Just as it becomes the nature of consciousness, it is also the object of comprehension. Therefore, consciousness itself is the result.

original: de ni bden te /üîΩtshad ma 'bras bu gzhan min zhing //
analyzed: de ni bden te / tshad ma 'bras bu gzhan min zhing //
translated: That is true.üîΩValid knowledge is not a different result.

original: tshad ma 'bras bu las gzhan min //
analyzed: tshad ma 'bras bu las gzhan min //
translated: Valid knowledge is not different from the result.

original: bya dang byed pa'i rnam gzhag ni //
analyzed: bya dang byed pa'i rnam gzhag ni //
translated: The presentation of the agent and action

original: thams cad de ltar 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: thams cad de ltar 'gyur ba yin //
translated: is like that in all cases.

original: 'di yang 'og tu ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di yang 'og tu ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will be explained later.

original: gal te ci ltar mig la sogs pa tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin du rnam pa yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te ci ltar mig la sogs pa tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin du rnam pa yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If one says: Just as the eye, etc. are not valid knowledge, so too the aspect would not be.

original: ji ltar myong ba'i byed pa po yin yang mig la sogs pa tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin du rnam pa yang yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar myong ba'i byed pa po yin yang mig la sogs pa tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin du rnam pa yang yin no zhe na /
translated: Just as the eye, etc. are not valid knowledge even though they are the experiencer, so too the aspect would be.

original: bshad pa / de yod na ni 'di yod phyir ;
analyzed: bshad pa / de yod na ni 'di yod phyir ;
translated: In response to that, it is said: Because when that exists, this exists.

original: / rnam pa yod na rtogs pa'i 'bras bu 'di yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: / rnam pa yod na rtogs pa'i 'bras bu 'di yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: mig la sogs pa yod na 'bras bu 'di yod pa nyid ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa yod na 'bras bu 'di yod pa nyid ni ma yin gyi /
translated: But this effect does not exist if the eye, etc. exist.

original: tha mi dad pa'i phyir rnam pa yod na ni yod pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir na sgrub par byed pa dam pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'i phyir rnam pa yod na ni yod pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir na sgrub par byed pa dam pa nyid yin la /
translated: But if the aspect exists, then it does exist, because it is not different. Therefore, it is the best proof.

original: sgrub par byed pa dam pa nyid kyang byed pa po yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa dam pa nyid kyang byed pa po yin no //
translated: And the best proof is the agent.

original: sgrub par byed pa dam pa nyid ni chod pa med na yin no zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa dam pa nyid ni chod pa med na yin no zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: And the best proof is when there is no obstruction.

original: 'o na ji ltar mig gis gzugs mthong ba zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar mig gis gzugs mthong ba zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Well then, how is it that the eye sees visible form?

original: rgyu la 'bras bu btags pas de skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyu la 'bras bu btags pas de skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: It is said that way because the effect is figuratively designated to the cause.

original: dper na rkun pos grong bsregs so zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rkun pos grong bsregs so zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like saying, ‚ÄúThe thief burned the village.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir shes pa nyid tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa nyid tshad ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, cognition itself is the valid cognition.

original: gal te shes pa 'di thob par byed pa yin no zhes ji ltar shes par bya /
analyzed: gal te shes pa 'di thob par byed pa yin no zhes ji ltar shes par bya /
translated: If this cognition is the producer, how is it known?

original: re zhig mngon sum las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: re zhig mngon sum las ni ma yin no //
translated: First, it is not from direct perception.

original: rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis ni tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i rnam par dbye ba ston par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis ni tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i rnam par dbye ba ston par byed pa ma yin te /

original: shes pa thams cad la rang rig pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa thams cad la rang rig pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all consciousnesses have self-awareness.

original: de skyes pa'i dus nyid na mi slu ba dang / cig shos kyi shes pa'i rnam par dbye ba shes nas /
analyzed: de skyes pa'i dus nyid na mi slu ba dang / cig shos kyi shes pa'i rnam par dbye ba shes nas /
translated: When it arises, it knows the distinction between the nondeceptive and the other consciousnesses.

original: 'jug na 'ga' yang bslus par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'jug na 'ga' yang bslus par mi 'gyur la /
translated: If it engages, then no one would be deceived.

original: the tshom du yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: the tshom du yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And there would be no doubt.

original: 'on te gnod pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshad mar rang nyid las rab tu grub pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te gnod pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshad mar rang nyid las rab tu grub pa yin na /
translated: But if it is established from itself as valid knowledge with the characteristic of nondeceptiveness,

analyzed: shes @20b pa lkog tu gyur par smra ba rnams kyi don go bas bsgrub pa de ci ltar rang las 'grub /

original: 'on te don gyi go bas ni shes pa yod par 'grub la /
analyzed: 'on te don gyi go bas ni shes pa yod par 'grub la /
translated: But if the existence of consciousness is established by understanding the object,

analyzed: don gyi go bas shes pa de'i tshad ma ni gzhan gyi shes pa ma yin gyi /

analyzed: rang nyid las tshad ma yin no //
translated: but is valid knowledge from itself,üîΩthen it is not established from itself.

original: tshad ma ma yin pa ni gnod par byed pa'i shes pa las yin la gnod par byed pa'i shes pa yang rang nyid las tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin pa ni gnod par byed pa'i shes pa las yin la gnod par byed pa'i shes pa yang rang nyid las tshad ma yin no //

original: gzhan yang rnam par shes pa ni rgyu las skye ba yin la /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam par shes pa ni rgyu las skye ba yin la /
translated: Moreover, consciousness arises from a cause.

original: de'i tshad ma ni rang nyid las yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshad ma ni rang nyid las yin no //
translated: And its validity is with respect to itself.

original: gnod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid de yang sel bar byed pa gnod byed kyi shes pas 'gog pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid de yang sel bar byed pa gnod byed kyi shes pas 'gog pa yin no zhe na /
translated: And the characteristic of that which is contradicted is refuted by the cognition that contradicts it.

original: 'di la brjod pa /üîΩgal te rang las tshad yin na //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa / gal te rang las tshad yin na //
translated: To this we reply:üîΩIf it is valid with respect to itself,

original: rang gi rgyu yi dngos po las //
analyzed: rang gi rgyu yi dngos po las //
translated: then it arises from its own cause.

original: de ltar skyes te gnod byed ni //
analyzed: de ltar skyes te gnod byed ni //
translated: In that case, the contradiction

analyzed: gzhan gyis gzhan du byed ma yin // ci ste bdag ces rang bzhin phyir //
translated: is not produced by another.üîΩIf it is said to be valid with respect to itself

original: rang las tshad mar brjod na ni //
analyzed: rang las tshad mar brjod na ni //
translated: because it has the nature of self,

original: gnod par byed pa stong yod kyang //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa stong yod kyang //
translated: then even though there are a thousand contradictions,

original: de gzhan 'gyur ba yod ma yin //üîΩgal te skyon can rgyu yod pas //
analyzed: de gzhan 'gyur ba yod ma yin // gal te skyon can rgyu yod pas //
translated: it will not become other.üîΩIf it is said that it is not valid

original: tshad ma min par 'gyur zhe na //
analyzed: tshad ma min par 'gyur zhe na //
translated: because it has a faulty cause,

original: yon tan ldan rgyu dang 'brel phyir //
analyzed: yon tan ldan rgyu dang 'brel phyir //
translated: Because it is related to the cause of the qualities.

original: ci phyir tshad mar 'dod ma yin //
analyzed: ci phyir tshad mar 'dod ma yin //
translated: Why is it not accepted as valid cognition?üîΩIf it is accepted as valid cognition

original: gal te nyes pa med pa'i phyir //üîΩde ni tshad ma yin 'dod na //üîΩyon tan med phyir tshad min par //
analyzed: gal te nyes pa med pa'i phyir // de ni tshad ma yin 'dod na // yon tan med phyir tshad min par //
translated: because it is free from error,üîΩwhy is it not understood that

original: de ni ci phyir rtogs ma yis //üîΩgang gis de yi tshad ma dang // tshad min gzhan las yin 'gyur pa //üîΩtshad ma dang ni cig shos las //
analyzed: de ni ci phyir rtogs ma yis // gang gis de yi tshad ma dang // tshad min gzhan las yin 'gyur pa // tshad ma dang ni cig shos las //
translated: it is not valid cognition because it lacks qualities?üîΩThe self is not cognized from

original: gzhan pa'i bdag ni rtogs pa med //
analyzed: gzhan pa'i bdag ni rtogs pa med //
translated: valid cognition or from something else.

original: gal te de rtogs bdag 'dod na //
analyzed: gal te de rtogs bdag 'dod na //
